byline.original: By CARL HULSE and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN

abstract: Sen Benjamin L Cardin, Democrat of Maryland and member of Senate Foreign Relations Committee, announces opposition to Iran nuclear deal; decision raises possibility that Pres Obama will be forced to use his veto powers to keep agreement alive.
lead_paragraph: Benjamin L. Cardin, the senior Democrat on the Foreign Relations Committee, said he would push for legislation to controls on how the accord is carried out.

headline.main: Key Senate Democrat Announces Opposition to Iran Nuclear Deal
headline.print_headline: 3rd Senate Democrat Will Oppose Iran Deal

snippet: Benjamin L. Cardin, the senior Democrat on the Foreign Relations Committee, said he would push for legislation to controls on how the accord is carried out.
